reviewText: I bought this so I could hear J. Mark McVey because I first heard him on Hour of Power.  I wish I could find other DVDs of only him singing.  He puts so much passion into his singing that it stirs my soul.
Purchased this plus cd ( Christian Book)and MP3 (Amazon). Mark McVey has helped Signature Sound expand their versatility. Mr McVey's vocal talent is well known if you love musical theater.
